title: Five-star Luxury Villas in Halkidiki with Six Restaurants & Four Bars
description: Discover rich cobalt waters and unsurpassed hospitality at Eagles Villas Halkidiki, Greece. Hooked on the island's most charming peninsula, this all-villa destination boasts a marriage of dramatic landscapes and coastal lifestyle. Have evening cocktails brought to you on your beachside lounge, be thrilled by water sports, admire breathtaking sights, and wine and dine your way through the abundance of onsite restaurants and bars, including modern Mediterranean bites at Lofos.
offer_address: Skala Neon Rodon, Ouranoupolis, Halkidiki 63075 Greece
